english.segment1: Youve stripped me down, the layers fall like rain. Its over now, just innocence and instinct still remain. You watched me while I slowly disappeared. I reached for you to save me; you were frozen in your fear
english.segment3: Circling the pain inside my soul. I reached inside your silence to steal what you wont show. I tried to find the answers in my fears. But what was found is lost again as soon as it appeared
english.segment5: Im breaking; I cant do this on my own. Can you hear me screaming out, am I all alone?
